text: The War Wagon is a 1967 American western movie directed by Burt Kennedy and based on the novel of the same name by Clair Huffaker. It stars John Wayne, Kirk Douglas, Howard Keel, Keenan Wynn, Bruce Dern, Bruce Cabot, Hal Needham and distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1967 movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Burt Kennedy Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: The War Wagon
